description:
The home port is throwing a costume academy fair.
After being urged by North Carolina to dress up, Javelin and friends go and really enjoy the academy fair with an embarrassed Honolulu.
Who is going to be the lucky one to get the coveted premium prize?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To jest to, co króliczki lubią najbardziej!
みんなでワイワイお祭り!
